name: Space Brawl
description:
Space Brawl - Destroy opposing team's station to win the game.

Controls

  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Laser Shoot
  • Right Click - Special Skill

All Assets used are free.

If you found any bugs or think of any recommendations, suggestions and/or criticisms to make the game entertaining/amusing, please don't hesitate to leave a comment down below or contact/DM me through. 

  • Discord: karitxl#4371
  • Reddit: U/Karitxl

Your feedbacks are greatly appreciated.

Note: This release is still in early beta so the game is not completely polished yet. And due to Unity PUN's free version limitation, only US East and Japan regions are available, 1 game room each region and a maximum of 10 players per room.

Default is in full screen mode because non full screen is buggy in itch.io
